author: jtrube
title: Candy Pop-Up Campaign
description: There is a large untapped resource of individuals who are casually aware of Cardano, but do not actively participate in the community.
solution: Develop and deploy an original brand campaign from Japan with art, NFTs, merchandise, and more.
experience: Over a decade of event production and content creation in the Japanese market for clients such as Google, Porsche, Ralph Lauren, and more.
